Title: Relates to absentee voting application deadlines
Summary: Relates to absentee voting application deadlines; all applications requesting an absentee ballot by mail must be received by the board of elections no later than the fifteenth day before the election for a ballot is first requested; applications delivered in person shall be received no later than the day before such election.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to absentee voting application deadlines
